snippet.title: Nova Roma - Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Announced first at the PC Gaming Show 2023, Nova Roma is a new city builder from Lion Shield and strategy publisher Hooded Horse. The stylish treatment of ancient Rome has you managing natural features like water, and catering to the needs of elite politicians and citizens. Read more on PC Gamer: https://www.pcgamer.com/nova-roma-announcement-pcgs-2023
